content:
There will be a FOSDEM viewing party in Dorchester from 9:00 to 13:00 on Saturday Jan 31. They will be focused on the Social Web track, as it's hosted by the Boston ATProto (Bluesky protocol) meet up.

https://smokesignal.events/did:plc:pqerwmnouevyltxyoayhholf/3mbpgfvjzsk2o

I'll be there.
Nice! I added it to my calendar at least! I went to FOSDEM in 2020 (and gave a talk).
Shoot, I might need to miss this. My daughter left some ski gear near Manchester, NH and my wife and I are planning on driving up that day to pick it up (and hopefully ski or at least snowshoe).
Ah dang. Well in the unlikely case I happen to make my way to that area myself in the next week I'll let you know. Maybe we could save a trip.
